nodes.text: Sarini Island was an island located on the planet Chandrila. It featured a zoo. In 5 ABY, Brentin, Temmin, and Norra Wexley arrived in Sarini Island to visit its zoo. During their visit, they saw pangorins in their grottoes, caw-crabs splashing around their enclosures, and uralangs, which Brentin laughed at.
Sarini Island was first mentioned in Aftermath: Life Debt, a novel by Chuck Wendig, which was released on July 12, 2016.
